summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Edit Campaign Dates feature. All 10 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing verified Edit Dates button, modal, date validation, and successful date updates with toast notifications.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Edit Campaign Dates feature is fully implemented and working. PUT /api/v1/campaigns/{id}/dates endpoint validates brand ownership and updates dates in database. Frontend shows Edit Dates button only for published/live campaigns. Modal has date validation preventing end date before start date.

tests: Validates brand ownership (404 for non-existent campaign)

GET /api/v1/campaigns.notes: Campaign list includes all date fields

edit_dates_button.notes: Shows only for published/live campaigns, found 4 buttons for 4 published campaigns

date_prefill.notes: Modal opens with current campaign dates pre-filled

date_validation.notes: Shows error toast 'Purchase window end date must be after start date' when end date is before start date

success_toast.notes: Shows 'Campaign dates updated successfully!' after saving valid dates

modal_close_on_success.notes: Modal closes automatically after successful save

dates_update_in_list.notes: Campaign card shows updated dates after save
